metadata.name: Indifference
metadata.description:
Indifference here throws light on what most have maybe joked about and some pay zero attention to. No matter how we put it , we're all humans and that makes us one despite the color of our skin.

This artwork lays emphasis on the hand of one with 'vitiligo' , something some see as a weird sickness whereas people like me and @ agbatamessoma sees it as unique.

As an artists who most of the time creates from emotions and deep connections I find this what creating. I hope you enjoy it!

___________________
pencils on paper.
30 x 33 cm , | 2023 |
